title:

subtitle: รวบรวมข้อมูลจากตู้โชว์ตัวละครภายในเกมและสร้างการ์ดตัวละครได้ในฉับไว
in_time: ใช้งานได้ในอีก {{time}}
export_image: ส่งออกเป็นรูปภาพ
uid_whitelist:
This UID needs to be whitelisted
for beta-testing.
uid_1:
To join the beta test, you can become a supporter on Patreon.
You'll be able to view your in-game Character Showcase and send the link to others so they can view your profile.
uid_2: After the full version releases, supporters will have access to further beta-test features, such as unique short links.

profile.closed: Please enable the "Show Character Details" option in your Character Showcase in-game to see the details.
profile.no_characters: No characters found in the Character Showcase.
